006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.testing;
007
008import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.IContentValidator;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.IValidationFinding;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.IValidationResult;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.JsonSchemaContentValidator.JsonValidationFinding;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.DefaultBindingContext;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.Format;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.ISerializer;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.BindingModuleLoader;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.testing.xml.xmlbeans.ContentCaseType;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.testing.xml.xmlbeans.GenerateSchemaDocument.GenerateSchema;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.testing.xml.xmlbeans.MetaschemaDocument;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.testing.xml.xmlbeans.TestCollectionDocument.TestCollection;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.testing.xml.xmlbeans.TestScenarioDocument.TestScenario;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.testing.xml.xmlbeans.TestSuiteDocument;
028
029import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogBuilder;
030import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
032import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException;
033import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlOptions;
034import org.junit.jupiter.api.DynamicContainer;
035import org.junit.jupiter.api.DynamicNode;
036import org.junit.jupiter.api.DynamicTest;
037import org.junit.platform.commons.JUnitException;
038
039import java.io.IOException;
040import java.io.Writer;
041import java.net.URI;
042import java.net.URISyntaxException;
043import java.net.URL;
044import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
045import java.nio.file.FileVisitResult;
046import java.nio.file.Files;
047import java.nio.file.OpenOption;
048import java.nio.file.Path;
049import java.nio.file.SimpleFileVisitor;
050import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
051import java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes;
052import java.util.function.BiFunction;
053import java.util.function.Function;
054import java.util.function.Supplier;
055import java.util.stream.Stream;
056
057import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
058import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
059import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
060
061public abstract class AbstractTestSuite {
062  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(AbstractTestSuite.class);
063  private static final BindingModuleLoader LOADER;
064
065  private static final boolean DELETE_RESULTS_ON_EXIT = false;
066
067  static {
068    IBindingContext bindingContext = new DefaultBindingContext();
069    LOADER = new BindingModuleLoader(bindingContext);
070    LOADER.allowEntityResolution();
071  }
072
073  @NonNull
074  protected abstract Format getRequiredContentFormat();
075
076  @NonNull
077  protected abstract URI getTestSuiteURI();
078
079  @NonNull
080  protected abstract Path getGenerationPath();
081
082  @NonNull
083  protected abstract BiFunction<IModule, Writer, Void> getGeneratorSupplier();
084
085  @Nullable
086  protected abstract Supplier<? extends IContentValidator> getSchemaValidatorSupplier();
087
088  @NonNull
089  protected abstract Function<Path, ? extends IContentValidator> getContentValidatorSupplier();
090
091  protected Stream<DynamicNode> testFactory() {
092    try {
093      return generateTests();
094    } catch (XmlException | IOException ex) {
095      throw new JUnitException("Unable to generate tests", ex);
096    }
097  }
098
099  private Stream<DynamicNode> generateTests() throws XmlException, IOException {
100    XmlOptions options = new XmlOptions();
101    options.setBaseURI(null);
102    options.setLoadLineNumbers();
103
104    Path generationPath = getGenerationPath();
105    if (Files.exists(generationPath)) {
106      if (!Files.isDirectory(generationPath)) {
107        throw new JUnitException(String.format("Generation path '%s' exists and is not a directory", generationPath));
108      }
109    } else {
110      Files.createDirectories(generationPath);
111    }
112
113    URI testSuiteUri = getTestSuiteURI();
114    URL testSuiteUrl = testSuiteUri.toURL();
115    TestSuiteDocument directive = TestSuiteDocument.Factory.parse(testSuiteUrl, options);
116    return directive.getTestSuite().getTestCollectionList().stream()
117        .flatMap(
118            collection -> Stream.of(generateCollection(ObjectUtils.notNull(collection), testSuiteUri, generationPath)));
119  }
120
121  protected void deleteCollectionOnExit(Path path) {
122    if (path != null) {
123      Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread( // NOPMD - this is not a webapp
124          () -> {
125            try {
126              Files.walkFileTree(path, new SimpleFileVisitor<Path>() {
127                @Override
128                public FileVisitResult visitFile(Path file, BasicFileAttributes attrs) throws IOException {
129                  Files.delete(file);
130                  return FileVisitResult.CONTINUE;
131                }
132
133                @Override
134                public FileVisitResult postVisitDirectory(Path dir, IOException ex) throws IOException {
135                  if (ex == null) {
136                    Files.delete(dir);
137                    return FileVisitResult.CONTINUE;
138                  }
139                  // directory iteration failed for some reason
140                  throw ex;
141                }
142              });
143            } catch (IOException ex) {
144              throw new JUnitException("Failed to delete collection: " + path, ex);
145            }
146          }));
147    }
148  }
149
150  private DynamicContainer generateCollection(@NonNull TestCollection collection, @NonNull URI testSuiteUri,
151      @NonNull Path generationPath) {
152    URI collectionUri = testSuiteUri.resolve(collection.getLocation());
153    assert collectionUri != null;
154
155    LOGGER.atInfo().log("Collection: " + collectionUri);
156    Lazy<Path> collectionGenerationPath = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> {
157      Path retval;
158      try {
159        retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(Files.createTempDirectory(generationPath, "collection-"));
160        assert retval != null;
161        if (DELETE_RESULTS_ON_EXIT) {
162          deleteCollectionOnExit(retval);
163        }
164      } catch (IOException ex) {
165        throw new JUnitException("Unable to create collection temp directory", ex);
166      }
167      return retval;
168    }));
169
170    return DynamicContainer.dynamicContainer(
171        collection.getName(),
172        testSuiteUri,
173        collection.getTestScenarioList().stream()
174            .flatMap(scenario -> {
175              assert scenario != null;
176              return Stream.of(generateScenario(scenario, collectionUri, collectionGenerationPath));
177            })
178            .sequential());
179  }
180
181  protected void produceSchema(@NonNull IModule module, @NonNull Path schemaPath) throws IOException {
182    produceSchema(module, schemaPath, getGeneratorSupplier());
183  }
184
185  protected void produceSchema(@NonNull IModule module, @NonNull Path schemaPath,
186      @NonNull BiFunction<IModule, Writer, Void> schemaProducer) throws IOException {
187    Path parentDir = schemaPath.getParent();
188    if (parentDir != null && !Files.exists(parentDir)) {
189      Files.createDirectories(parentDir);
190    }
191
192    try (Writer writer = Files.newBufferedWriter(
193        schemaPath,
194        StandardCharsets.UTF_8,
195        getWriteOpenOptions())) {
196      schemaProducer.apply(module, writer);
197    }
198    LOGGER.atInfo().log("Produced schema '{}' for module '{}'", schemaPath, module.getLocation());
199  }
200
201  protected OpenOption[] getWriteOpenOptions() {
202    return new OpenOption[] {
203        StandardOpenOption.CREATE,
204        StandardOpenOption.WRITE,
205        StandardOpenOption.TRUNCATE_EXISTING
206    };
207  }
208
209  private DynamicContainer generateScenario(
210      @NonNull TestScenario scenario,
211      @NonNull URI collectionUri,
212      @NonNull Lazy<Path> collectionGenerationPath) {
213    Lazy<Path> scenarioGenerationPath = Lazy.lazy(() -> {
214      Path retval;
215      try {
216        retval = Files.createTempDirectory(collectionGenerationPath.get(), "scenario-");
217      } catch (IOException ex) {
218        throw new JUnitException("Unable to create scenario temp directory", ex);
219      }
220      return retval;
221    });
222
223    // try {
224    // // create the directories the schema will be stored in
225    // Files.createDirectories(scenarioGenerationPath);
226    // } catch (IOException ex) {
227    // throw new JUnitException("Unable to create test directories for path: " +
228    // scenarioGenerationPath, ex);
229    // }
230
231    GenerateSchema generateSchema = scenario.getGenerateSchema();
232    MetaschemaDocument.Metaschema metaschemaDirective = generateSchema.getMetaschema();
233    URI metaschemaUri = collectionUri.resolve(metaschemaDirective.getLocation());
234
235    Lazy<IModule> lazyModule = Lazy.lazy(() -> {
236      IModule module;
237      try {
238        module = LOADER.load(ObjectUtils.notNull(metaschemaUri.toURL()));
239      } catch (IOException | MetaschemaException ex) {
240        throw new JUnitException("Unable to generate schema for Module: " + metaschemaUri, ex);
241      }
242      return module;
243    });
244
245    Lazy<Path> lazySchema = Lazy.lazy(() -> {
246      Path schemaPath;
247
248      String schemaExtension;
249      Format requiredContentFormat = getRequiredContentFormat();
250      switch (requiredContentFormat) {
251      case JSON:
252      case YAML:
253        schemaExtension = ".json";
254        break;
255      case XML:
256        schemaExtension = ".xsd";
257        break;
258      default:
259        throw new IllegalStateException();
260      }
261
262      // determine what file to use for the schema
263      try {
264        schemaPath = Files.createTempFile(scenarioGenerationPath.get(), "", "-schema" + schemaExtension);
265      } catch (IOException ex) {
266        throw new JUnitException("Unable to create schema temp file", ex);
267      }
268      IModule module = lazyModule.get();
269      try {
270        produceSchema(ObjectUtils.notNull(module), ObjectUtils.notNull(schemaPath));
271      } catch (IOException ex) {
272        throw new IllegalStateException(ex);
273      }
274      return schemaPath;
275    });
276
277    Lazy<IBindingContext> lazyDynamicBindingContext = Lazy.lazy(() -> {
278      IModule module = lazyModule.get();
279      IBindingContext context;
280      try {
281        context = new DefaultBindingContext();
282        context.registerModule(
283            ObjectUtils.notNull(module),
284            ObjectUtils.notNull(scenarioGenerationPath.get()));
285      } catch (Exception ex) { // NOPMD - intentional
286        throw new JUnitException("Unable to generate classes for metaschema: " + metaschemaUri, ex);
287      }
288      return context;
289    });
290    assert lazyDynamicBindingContext != null;
291
292    Lazy<IContentValidator> lazyContentValidator = Lazy.lazy(() -> {
293      Path schemaPath = lazySchema.get();
294      return getContentValidatorSupplier().apply(schemaPath);
295    });
296    assert lazyContentValidator != null;
297
298    // build a test container for the generate and validate steps
299    DynamicTest validateSchema = DynamicTest.dynamicTest(
300        "Validate Schema",
301        () -> {
302          Supplier<? extends IContentValidator> supplier = getSchemaValidatorSupplier();
303          if (supplier != null) {
304            Path schemaPath;
305            try {
306              schemaPath = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(lazySchema.get());
307            } catch (Exception ex) {
308              throw new JUnitException( // NOPMD - cause is relevant, exception is not
309                  "failed to generate schema", ex.getCause());
310            }
311            validateWithSchema(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(supplier.get()), schemaPath);
312          }
313        });
314
315    Stream<? extends DynamicNode> contentTests;
316    {
317      contentTests = scenario.getValidationCaseList().stream()
318          .flatMap(contentCase -> {
319            assert contentCase != null;
320            DynamicTest test
321                = generateValidationCase(
322                    contentCase,
323                    lazyDynamicBindingContext,
324                    lazyContentValidator,
325                    collectionUri,
326                    ObjectUtils.notNull(scenarioGenerationPath));
327            return test == null ? Stream.empty() : Stream.of(test);
328          }).sequential();
329    }
330
331    return DynamicContainer.dynamicContainer(
332        scenario.getName(),
333        metaschemaUri,
334        Stream.concat(Stream.of(validateSchema), contentTests).sequential());
335  }
336
337  protected Path convertContent(
338      @NonNull URI contentUri,
339      @NonNull Path generationPath,
340      @NonNull IBindingContext context)
341      throws IOException {
342    Object object;
343    try {
344      object = context.newBoundLoader().load(ObjectUtils.notNull(contentUri.toURL()));
345    } catch (URISyntaxException ex) {
346      throw new IOException(ex);
347    }
348
349    if (!Files.exists(generationPath)) {
350      Files.createDirectories(generationPath);
351    }
352
353    Path convertedContetPath;
354    try {
355      convertedContetPath = ObjectUtils.notNull(Files.createTempFile(generationPath, "", "-content"));
356    } catch (IOException ex) {
357      throw new JUnitException("Unable to create schema temp file", ex);
358    }
359
360    @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") ISerializer serializer
361        = context.newSerializer(getRequiredContentFormat(), ObjectUtils.asType(object.getClass()));
362    serializer.serialize(ObjectUtils.asType(object), convertedContetPath, getWriteOpenOptions());
363
364    return convertedContetPath;
365  }
366
367  private DynamicTest generateValidationCase(
368      @NonNull ContentCaseType contentCase,
369      @NonNull Lazy<IBindingContext> lazyBindingContext,
370      @NonNull Lazy<IContentValidator> lazyContentValidator,
371      @NonNull URI collectionUri,
372      @NonNull Lazy<Path> generationPath) {
373
374    URI contentUri = ObjectUtils.notNull(collectionUri.resolve(contentCase.getLocation()));
375
376    Format format = contentCase.getSourceFormat();
377    DynamicTest retval = null;
378    if (getRequiredContentFormat().equals(format)) {
379      retval = DynamicTest.dynamicTest(
380          String.format("Validate %s=%s: %s", format, contentCase.getValidationResult(),
381              contentCase.getLocation()),
382          contentUri,
383          () -> {
384            IContentValidator contentValidator;
385            try {
386              contentValidator = lazyContentValidator.get();
387            } catch (Exception ex) {
388              throw new JUnitException( // NOPMD - cause is relevant, exception is not
389                  "failed to produce the content validator", ex.getCause());
390            }
391
392            assertEquals(
393                contentCase.getValidationResult(),
394                validateWithSchema(
395                    ObjectUtils.notNull(contentValidator), ObjectUtils.notNull(contentUri.toURL())),
396                "validation did not match expectation for: " + contentUri.toASCIIString());
397          });
398    } else if (contentCase.getValidationResult()) {
399      retval = DynamicTest.dynamicTest(
400          String.format("Convert and Validate %s=%s: %s", format, contentCase.getValidationResult(),
401              contentCase.getLocation()),
402          contentUri,
403          () -> {
404            IBindingContext context;
405            try {
406              context = lazyBindingContext.get();
407            } catch (Exception ex) {
408              throw new JUnitException( // NOPMD - cause is relevant, exception is not
409                  "failed to produce the content validator", ex.getCause());
410            }
411            assert context != null;
412
413            Path convertedContetPath;
414            try {
415              convertedContetPath = convertContent(contentUri, ObjectUtils.notNull(generationPath.get()), context);
416            } catch (Exception ex) { // NOPMD - intentional
417              throw new JUnitException("failed to convert content: " + contentUri, ex);
418            }
419
420            IContentValidator contentValidator;
421            try {
422              contentValidator = lazyContentValidator.get();
423            } catch (Exception ex) {
424              throw new JUnitException( // NOPMD - cause is relevant, exception is not
425                  "failed to produce the content validator",
426                  ex.getCause());
427            }
428            assertEquals(contentCase.getValidationResult(),
429                validateWithSchema(
430                    ObjectUtils.notNull(contentValidator),
431                    ObjectUtils.notNull(convertedContetPath.toUri().toURL())),
432                String.format("validation of '%s' did not match expectation", convertedContetPath));
433          });
434    }
435    return retval;
436  }
437
438  private static boolean validateWithSchema(@NonNull IContentValidator validator, @NonNull URL target)
439      throws IOException {
440    IValidationResult schemaValidationResult;
441    try {
442      schemaValidationResult = validator.validate(target);
443    } catch (URISyntaxException ex) {
444      throw new IOException(ex);
445    }
446    return processValidationResult(schemaValidationResult);
447  }
448
449  protected static boolean validateWithSchema(@NonNull IContentValidator validator, @NonNull Path target)
450      throws IOException {
451    IValidationResult schemaValidationResult = validator.validate(target);
452    if (!schemaValidationResult.isPassing()) {
453      LOGGER.atError().log("Schema validation failed for: {}", target);
454    }
455    return processValidationResult(schemaValidationResult);
456  }
457
458  private static boolean processValidationResult(IValidationResult schemaValidationResult) {
459    for (IValidationFinding finding : schemaValidationResult.getFindings()) {
460      logFinding(ObjectUtils.notNull(finding));
461    }
462    return schemaValidationResult.isPassing();
463  }
464
465  private static void logFinding(@NonNull IValidationFinding finding) {
466    LogBuilder logBuilder;
467    switch (finding.getSeverity()) {
468    case CRITICAL:
469      logBuilder = LOGGER.atFatal();
470      break;
471    case ERROR:
472      logBuilder = LOGGER.atError();
473      break;
474    case WARNING:
475      logBuilder = LOGGER.atWarn();
476      break;
477    case INFORMATIONAL:
478      logBuilder = LOGGER.atInfo();
479      break;
480    case DEBUG:
481      logBuilder = LOGGER.atDebug();
482      break;
483    default:
484      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown level: " + finding.getSeverity().name());
485    }
486
487    // if (finding.getCause() != null) {
488    // logBuilder.withThrowable(finding.getCause());
489    // }
490
491    if (finding instanceof JsonValidationFinding) {
492      JsonValidationFinding jsonFinding = (JsonValidationFinding) finding;
493      logBuilder.log("[{}] {}", jsonFinding.getCause().getPointerToViolation(), finding.getMessage());
494    } else {
495      logBuilder.log("{}", finding.getMessage());
496    }
497  }
498}
